SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into singapore_point (singapore_area_id, lat, lng, del_state, create_time) values (#{singaporeAreaId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{lat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lng,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{delState,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update singapore_point set singapore_point_id = #{singaporePointId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, lat = #{lat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, lng = #{lng,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, del_state = #{delState,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where singapore_point_id = #{singaporePointId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select singapore_area_id, singapore_point_id, lat, lng, del_state, create_time from singapore_point
